level.text: Subject to ยง 5802.2, a certificate issued pursuant to this chapter shall expire at 12:00 midnight of June 30 of each even-numbered year.

If the Director changes the renewal system pursuant to ยง 4006.3 of chapter 40 of this title, a certificate issued pursuant to this chapter shall expire at 12:00 midnight of the last day of the month of the birthdate of the holder of the certificate, or other date established by the Director.
